Groton Hills Conservation Area

Parking

Grolex Building, Chicopee Row, Groton MA
Google Maps, Apple Maps

Williams Barn, Chicopee Row, Groton MA
Google Maps, Apple Maps

Kailey's Way, Groton MA
Google Maps, Apple Maps

Hours

Half an hour past sunrise to half an hour past sunset. Sunrise Time , Sunset Time

Size

31.4 Acres, Trails 1.2 miles, 1.9 km

Property Owner

Groton Conservation Commission

Links

Official Conservation Commission Page
Groton Hills Ski

Trail Maintenance

Volunteers and the Groton Trails Committee. Please email gtc@grotontrails.org to report problems or volunteer.

Description

Groton Hills Conservation Area trails connects the Williams Barn and a large trail network around Sawtell Conservation Area. There is off street parking on Chicopee Row, and on street parking on the Kailey's Way turning circle. This property used to serve as the Groton Hills Ski area, and a hand gliding school.
